ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I became more comfortable and confident especially in reading German texts. Also gained much knowledge about German cities!
I definitely improved my vocabulary and understanding of German grammatical concepts from this class. I also gained a better insight into a lot of cultural aspects of Germany.

All my skills in German : writing, oral, comprehension and expression !
I also discovered about the culture and learnt the grammar

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I thought this class was great, but I didn't love the online platforms we had to use for our learning. I think it's often confusing and a hindrance to learning rather than a super strong resource. I also think that sometimes it lends itself to disorganization in learning. There were definitely times where I didn't understand what was an assignment and what wasn't, or how to turn things in, or other random problems that had nothing to do with actually learning material.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would! Shila is amazing, and I love learning German at Yale.
I would recommend this course ! Shila is an exceptional teacher !!
